title: "Person of Interest" Interview at Comic-Con 2015
author: TVLine
comment: I see Harold is still in character...
Jim looks like he's about to shoot everyone anytime, and not on the kneecaps.
Jim's pissed because their canceling the show. Apparently John Reese is the best character he's ever played and I concur. :)

THIS IS SERIOUSLY THE BEST SHOW EVER !!!!! Kept me hooked from beginning to end. Amazing storyline, amazing actors. This show is so so underrated . Instead of keeping all the cliche and similar tv shows on TV still, please just do us a favor and keep something on tv worth watching! Please dont let season 5 be the last !!!

The average american is too stupid for shows like Person.
Glad that we got over 100 episodes,one of the best shows of all time!!
description: The "Person Of Interest" cast looks ahead to a potential final season. ► http://bit.ly/TVLineSubscribe
